//about fragment
This app is a roommate organization tool for college students. Often roommates tend to be messy leaving dishes sitting out all day and letting the trash pile up. No one wants to take on the responsibility of tracking everyoneâ€™s chores or nagging their friends about keeping the house clean. My app will do the nagging for you! Just enter the desired chores and frequency the app will remind users to complete their chores.
Add New Chore Chore Title Chore Description ChoreFrequency Chore Completion Date weekly daily Add
